data.text: @SirEdwardCoyle @BostonSchools There is a Catholic school (well, at least nominally Catholic) in Newton called the Jackson School. They also are continuing with the flat earth “science” of masks. Absolutely shameful. May history never forget who the monsters were.
@wockerjabb @BostonSchools Not just the children. Wu and the new city councilors (including registered socialists like Lara) are set on fundamentally altering this great city. And it's happening now.
@SirEdwardCoyle @BostonSchools Wu has come for your children. #bospoli

@devianthamster @BostonSchools Everyone except BPS has moved on. And they don't realize (care) many students are well aware that other towns and cities are umasked at this point. This is control, this is cruelty. Full stop.
@SirEdwardCoyle @BostonSchools Has the school committee not heard about Ukraine? We've all moved on now, Chancellor Wu.
